archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Categorize Service Problem
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: This process is responsible for categorizing the service problem according to the type of the problem, impact, and standardized criteria at SM&O level. Moreover, this activity will be carried out with appropriate diligence, in order to provide inputs to the "Track & Manage Service Problem" process.
